snippet: To the Editor:   Your Sept. 1 front-page article about the troubles of public colleges and universities in California is an instance of a larger story -- the end of the golden age of universities in the United States....
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Your Sept. 1 front-page article about the troubles of public colleges and universities in California is an instance of a larger story -- the end of the golden age of universities in the United States.

headline.main: Not All Californians Flee Their State's Schools; They'll Have to Teach
